data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: I'm going to talk about a natural talent I have, which is empathy. The reason why I want to talk about it is that it is such a unique and important aptitude for me. Before I fully understand the importance of empathy, I used to think that empathy was useless and could make me feel very emotional. That is why I haven't paid too much attention to it and never thought it was my talent before. However, as I grew up, I finally found the beauty of empathy. I realize that I'm gradually becoming a good listener and a conversationalist because of my strong empathy. I can fully understand my friends' and family members' agony and anxiety and effectively comfort them with appropriate wordings. Empathy enables me to better comprehend other people's feelings and thoughts. Thus, I often keep positive relationships with the people around me. That's why I want to talk about empathy. (154字)
data.referenceText: Talk about a natural talent that you or someone you know has. How has it benefited you or them?
data.referenceTranslate: 说一个你或你认识的人的天赋。它对你或他们有什么好处？
